sentences.en: a feature that allows you to browse your hard drive and choose the graphic you want to display
sentences.cn: 让你可以浏览硬盘驱动器选择自己想要显示的图像的一个功能

sentences.en: Browse mode is invalid for subqueries and derived tables.
sentences.cn: 对于子查询和派生表,浏览模式无效.

sentences.en: Browse the list below to find our more and choose your favorites!
sentences.cn: 浏览下面的列表中找到我们的更多,并选择您的最爱!

sentences.en: Camels browse on trees as well as on ground cover.
sentences.cn: 骆驼既吃地被植物也吃树的枝叶.

sentences.en: He likes to browse through magazines in the library.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢在图书馆浏览杂志.

sentences.en: I had a browse through the books on her shelf.
sentences.cn: 我浏览了一下她书架上的书.

sentences.en: I stopped in several bookstores to browse.
sentences.cn: 我曾在几家书店停留，翻看里面的书。

sentences.en: It is a good idea to browse through it first.
Let's go in. I like to browse in interesting stores.
sentences.cn: 我们进去看看吧. 我喜欢在有意思的商场里浏览、逛游.

sentences.en: Q: Why can't I browse some people's file list?
sentences.cn: 问: 为什么我不能浏览某些用户的文件目录?

sentences.en: Select Browse Definition to view external components in the Object Browser.
sentences.cn: 选择“浏览定义”可在“对象浏览器”中查看外部组件.

sentences.en: Show the top overlay and select Browse Guide from the navigation menu.
sentences.cn: 资料显示最常见覆盖,并选择浏览指南从导航菜单中.

sentences.en: There are plenty of biographies for him to browse over.
These cattle can browse as well as others on grass.
sentences.cn: 这些牛和其它牛类一样,能咬食杂草.

sentences.en: You are welcome to come in and browse.
sentences.cn: 欢迎您光临本店随便看看。

sentences.en: You view a browse information file in the Object Browser.
sentences.cn: 在对象浏览器中查看浏览信息文件.

words.tran_cn: [计] 浏览器；吃嫩叶的动物；浏览书本的人

trans.tran_cn: （在商店里）随便看，翻阅，浏览（信息），（动物）吃草
trans.tran_en: to look through the pages of a book, magazine etc without a particular purpose, just looking at the most interesting parts
to look through the pages of a book, magazine etc without a particular purpose, just looking at the most interesting parts
if a goat,  deer  etc browses, it eats plants
